channel.title: keepalive on zaza的博客
channel.description: Recent content in keepalive on zaza的博客

item.title: Linux-keepalive-lvs双机高可用负载均衡
item.description: 基于Centos5.7测试通过 一、下载 # 建议安装稳定版本1.2.1 wget http://www.keepalived.org/software/keepalived-1.2.1.tar.gz 二、安装LVS管理工具 yum -y install ipvsadm 三、编译安装 # 依赖包 yum -y install popt-devel openssl-devel libnl-devel
